mapper.select: SELECT post_id, room_id, user_id, category, title, content, is_pinned, view_count, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM board_posts WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE board_posts SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
